short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimal Chrome new tab page replacement featuring a to-do list, weather information and tools to enhance your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
• Clean minimal design
• Dark mode
• Stunning backgrounds
• To Do list
• Weather forecast
• Date & time
• Most visited links
• Full bookmarks list
• Recently added bookmarks
• Browsing history
• Download manager
